title: New Client Makes Me Lag Without ms going up
body: When i play since the latest updates , ingame  becomes unplayable , i moonwalk on the surface every minute to half minute, the ms stays the same . Need to clear my head after this garbidge ... {{summoner:13}}  {{summoner:13}} {{summoner:13}}

replies.body:
Eeeee that 'moonwalking' sounds a lot like you might be experiencing some packet loss. Essentially, packet loss means that some of the data is getting lost between your network and our servers. Sometimes it's just caused by your ISP sending your connection through a crappy route, so it can't get to our servers all in one piece. 

If you goto our [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) and toss in your latest game logs that had that moonwalking, it will tell us for sure if you've got any packet loss. Take a screenshot using something Gyazo or Imgur and link it here for me to see as well!
Since last patch i also noticed some sort of packet loss lag , thing is that i don't have any packet loss in my log & my ping is stable at 38. feelsbad
